user_query: Hello. This is Zakza Misang The title of the movie I'm introducing today is… 'DogMan (DogMan.2024)' The 2018 Italian film of the same name is also good, but today it's Luc Besson's 'Dogman' There are spoilers until the end The subtitles that appear when the movie starts are impressive 'Wherever there is misfortune, God sends the dog' - This is a quote from French writer Alphonse de Lamartine The movie begins by sending the message that 'GOD' and 'DOG' are just reversed spellings That's why there's this version of the poster A woman driving a large truck is arrested by the police This suspicious woman has no ID or vehicle registration. She looks like Kang Ho-dong dressed up as a woman, and her big butt looks like she could blow away one or two police officers When the police opened the truck door, inside were... dozens of dogs? A transvestite now temporarily detained in the police station holding cell. His name is Caleb Psychologist Jojo is brought in to investigate Caleb The story now unfolds from Caleb's childhood Caleb lives with his violent father, who makes a living as a dog fighter Caleb was locked up in a dog pen just because he fed dogs His older brother, Torai, was only his father's right-hand man, and his kind but powerless mother felt sorry for Caleb and eventually left home Caleb thrives on the company of dogs who trust and rely on each other through their eyes and warmth, even if they don't communicate verbally, rather than on the family that shares his blood with
